France urges EU to sanction Shein over childlike sex dolls scandal
subhead: Paris called on the EU Commission to act against Shein after childlike sex dolls were found on its French website. The EU Commission said it takes the risks 'very seriously,' but did not plan to block access for now.

title: Residents 'stunned' after car-ramming attack on French island leaves five injured
subhead: Driving for 35 minutes, the driver deliberately struck five pedestrians and cyclists. Although he shouted 'Allahu akbar,' he was not known for radicalization. The National Anti-Terrorism Prosecutor's Office is monitoring the situation for now.

title: Celso Amorim, Lula's influential special adviser
subhead: At 83, Brazil's most seasoned and renowned diplomat continues to steer the country's foreign policy. We look back at the career of this respected 'sherpa,' who now criticizes Western countries while sparing Russia.

title: Ten years after it was signed, what has the Paris Agreement on climate change achieved?
subhead: The fate of the agreement will take center stage at the 30th United Nations Climate Change Conference, which opens on Thursday in Brazil with a summit of heads of state. Signed in 2015, the treaty has slowed global warming, but has not limited it to a sustainable level.

title: 'Russia holds a decisive edge in terms of manpower, firepower and mobilization capacity'
subhead: Three researchers at the French Institute of International Relations, Dimitri Minic, Tatiana Kastouéva-Jean and Paul Maurice, are urging Europe to intensify its power dynamic with Moscow.

title: Zohran Mamdani elected New York City mayor, capping astonishing rise
subhead: The election of the 34-year-old Democratic candidate to lead the world's financial capital marks a decisive political shift to reduce the cost of living, tax the wealthiest and staunchly oppose Donald Trump.
